data.text: @Cdogwoof @JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu But doesn't go far enough to show the advantage of natural immunity. Many don't even realise the evidence for pre-existing immunity. Instead of testing for an immune response we only tested en mass for Covid.

@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu Masking children to protect Granny is no solution.
And this ignores the mental damages caused by masks to name one.

@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu If that were the case then can we see the removal of peanuts in all stores and homes. Keep dogs out of restaurants and pubs for those with allergic asthma. And the list could go on.

@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu a socialist’s loony tunes fantasy. “mandates” are done, good riddance.  China will still micromanage your life if you like - the west does not. https://t.co/ClQZLL8PwX

@JuliaRaifman @jljcolorado @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu Public health is broken.

Let 2022 be the year we fix it.
@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu I thought this was an article written in 2020 about our children when I saw the headline.
@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu Covidiots are losing it!! Ha ha ha!

@JuliaRaifman @Theresa_Chapple @KatherineJWu This is especially compelling when you consider many children are not vaccinated and can not easily go against their parent’s wishes. I think this is why the decision makers are putting out information to suggest that many kids have at least some antibodies from prior infection
